issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
Cloud.Reviews.query returns objects that do not match the query.
This is breaking production apps such as Fashionist: http://bit.ly/1cwEWHK
I'm using a rating of 1 to differentiate between likes and comments.
Querying for reviews where rating is not 1 used to work. No code change (app has been out on itunes for awhile). Now random reviews seem to be returned including reviews with a rating of 1.
It's been reported on the Q&A board that a similar bug with Events Query just popped up this afternoon also.
Can ACS be rolled back to the previous version from earlier today until this issue is resolved?
fields.summary: ACS Review QUERY bug popped up this afternoon - regression from ACS update?

comments.body:
Hi N Morris,

Our deepest apologies for the inconvenience. We have fixed the issue. It would be great if you could try again and let us know the outcome.

Thanks!
Hey Daniel, I opened the bug. I have verified it's been fixed for the cases I opened it for. Thanks for the heads-up.
